code: import axios from"axios";import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var activate=function activate(user_id,success,failure){var activatePromise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/users/activate/").concat(user_id)).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.ACTIVATE,payload:activatePromise};};export var deActivate=function deActivate(user_id,success,failure){var deActivatePromise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/users/deActivate/").concat(user_id)).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.DE_ACTIVATE,payload:deActivatePromise};};
